ygData.subject: Re: Are you all at work?
ygData.msgSnippet: I still get stuff done at work, but you can definantly tell the EQ players here from the non EQ players. All the EQ players look very tired :) Digital crack, I
ygData.messageBody:
I still get stuff done at work, but you can definantly tell the EQ players
here from the non EQ players.
All the EQ players look very tired :)

Digital crack, I tell you...
--
Nick Shaffner
programmer: Duke Nukem Forever
3D Realms

>I'm at work. I, like you, try to play all night, and then come to
>work, only to read about the game, surf web sites about the game, look
>at maps, read about items. And today I went to lunch with two of my
>friends and we talked about the game (they play too). Is that an
>addiction, or what?
>
>>
>>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>>
>>Just wondering...
>>
>>...if I'm the only one who sits at work all day, reading these messages as
>>they come in. Its bad enough I play all night. Now, between surfing for
EQ
>>info, reading the newsgroup, and reading this list, its a wonder I get
>>anything done at all!
>>
>>
